# Portfolio Website Project - Next.js

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js 14 portfolio website with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, featuring:
- Hero section with profile information
- Featured work showcase
- Currently learning section with progress tracking
- Contact form with Formspree integration
- Optimized for Vercel deployment
